summary: Iron Man and Captain America battle to keep the Red Skull and his triggerman, Taskmaster, from unleashing an army of Hydra Brutes on the world.
cast: Adrian Pasdar|Roger Craig Smith|Fred Tatasciore|David Kaye|Clancy Brown|Liam O'Brien|Robin Atkin Downes|Dee Bradley Baker
keywords: based on comic book|marvel comics|superhero|captain america character|iron man character
title: Iron Man y Capitán América: Héroes unidos
